snippet: “Made in France,” a movie about a terrorist plot in Paris, was twice delayed after actual attacks and will now go straight to video on demand.
abstract: “Made in France,” a movie about a terrorist plot in Paris, was twice delayed after actual attacks and will now go straight to video on demand.

headline.main: French Movie About Jihadis Won’t Be Released in Theaters
headline.print_headline: No Theater Release for Film on Jihadists
